title: Model Configuration
subtitle: Configure and manage AI model providers
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?

providerSelection.title: Select Model Provider
providerSelection.subtitle: Choose a preset provider for quick setup, or select custom for full manual configuration
providerSelection.customDescription: Manually configure all parameters, suitable for private deployments or other unlisted providers
providerSelection.urlHint: Official API URL pre-filled, modify if using proxy or private deployment
providerSelection.formatHint: Automatically selected based on provider, usually no need to change

minimax.name: MiniMax
minimax.description: MiniMax M2 series large language models

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: DeepSeek V3 and R1 reasoning models

volcengine.name: Volcano Engine
volcengine.description: ByteDance Volcano Engine Doubao large language models

categoryHints.general_chat: Text Generation: Generate text responses, code, etc. for most conversation scenarios
categoryHints.multimodal: Image Understanding: Understand image content and have mixed text-image conversations
categoryHints.image_generation: Image Generation: Generate images from text descriptions
categoryHints.search_enhanced: Information Retrieval: Search the web for real-time information, only need name, API URL and key
categoryHints.speech_recognition: Speech Recognition: Convert speech to text (e.g., GLM-ASR)

form.modelNameHint: GLM-ASR uses glm-asr, other speech models use their corresponding model names
form.searchApiHint: Zhipu AI search API URL, or other compatible search API URL
form.contextWindowHint: Maximum context window size supported by the model (for calculating token usage percentage)
form.maxTokensHint: Maximum tokens for model output per request (affects response length)

thinking.enableHint: Requires model to support thinking mode
thinking.preserveHint: When enabled, preserves thinking content from previous conversation turns (requires model to support Preserved Thinking)

proxy.enableHint: When enabled, all AI requests will be sent through proxy (requires IDE restart)
proxy.saveSuccess: Proxy configuration saved, restart IDE to take effect

skipSslVerify.label: Skip SSL Certificate Verification
skipSslVerify.warning: Skipping SSL verification is a security risk, use only in test or internal network environments!

customHeaders.label: Custom Headers
customHeaders.hint: Add or modify HTTP request headers
customHeaders.modeReplaceHint: Custom headers will completely replace default headers (you need to add Content-Type, Authorization, etc.)
customHeaders.modeMergeHint: Apply default headers first, then apply custom headers (can override existing values, add new values)

customRequestBody.label: Custom Request Body
customRequestBody.hint: Enter request body fields in JSON format to override default request parameters
customRequestBody.invalidJson: Invalid JSON format, please check syntax
customRequestBody.mergeHint: Custom fields will override corresponding fields in the default request body
